items.content_html: Lightweight logging library enabling console logging and http logging.

items.content_html: Self-Assessment Quiz App is a lightweight web application that converts JSON data into interactive quizzes. With a simple interface built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, users can easily select different question sets and test their knowledge in real time.
items.title: DanyRolero/Quizify: Self-Assessment Quiz App is a lightweight web application that converts JSON data into interactive quizzes. With a simple interface built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, users can easily select different question sets and test their knowledge in real time.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.
items.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
items.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension that gives developers real-time insights into all incoming and outgoing network requests on any active tab.

items.content_html: WTPot is a lightweight embeddable JS widget that helps you to measure Willingness To Pay (WTP) for your product. WTPot emulates failing payment flow in a friendly way and collects customers' emails. No card/payment info is collected.
items.title: samsara-lab/wtpot: WTPot is a lightweight embeddable JS widget that helps you to measure Willingness To Pay (WTP) for your product. WTPot emulates failing payment flow in a friendly way and collects customers' emails. No card/payment info is collected.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A lightweight and themeable modal alert system for React, built with customization in mind. Supports classic layout, dark/light themes, and global config — ideal for confirmations, errors, success messages, and more.
items.title: codx-ak/notify-bolt: A lightweight and themeable modal alert system for React, built with customization in mind. Supports classic layout, dark/light themes, and global config — ideal for confirmations, errors, success messages, and more.
